mapper.select: select count(isbn) as ct ,batchNo from batch group by batchNo;
select count(isbn) as ct,batchNo from batch where status is not null and status = 1 group by batchNo;
select count(isbn) as ct ,batchNo from batch where status is not null and status = 0 group by batchNo;
select count(isbn) as ct ,batchNo from batch where status is null group by batchNo;
mapper.update: update batch set status = #{status}, failCause=#{failCause} where isbn=#{isbn}

CREATE TABLE `batch` ( `batchNo` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `status` int(2) NULL, isbn varchar(20) not null, failCause varchar(255) null, PRIMARY KEY (`isbn`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
